definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
Wikistats, (stats.wikimedia.org), online tool providing statistics for Wikimedia projects

sentences.english: A positional system of numeration that uses decimal digits and a radix of10.
sentences.chinese: 使用十进位数字字和基数10记数的一种位置法。

sentences.english: Develop and modify your homestead development plan and its self-supporting income base.
sentences.chinese: 制定和修改您仕达发展计划及其自给收入基数。

sentences.english: Well, they have a much larger population base. Too large actually.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，他们有一个巨大的人口基数，非常巨大。

sentences.english: In view of our two big populations, the figures are too small.
sentences.chinese: 相对于两国庞大的人口基数，这些数字显得渺小。

sentences.english: Then set the current base to the existing level of acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 然后将当前的基数设为现有的加速度级别。

sentences.english: There's not al a rge enough base of workers to support them.
sentences.chinese: 现在的工人的基数不够大，不足以维持他们的生计。

sentences.english: For example, cardinality restrictions specify the number of relationships that a class of individuals can participate in.
sentences.chinese: 例如，基数限制指定某类个体可以参与的关系的数量。

sentences.english: A number system written to the base two notation.
sentences.chinese: 一种使用以2为基数的记数法的数制。

sentences.english: The radix sort can be used on card sorting.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用的基数排序在卡片分类。

sentences.english: Paid developers are more likely to maintain critical parts of the code base.
sentences.chinese: 支薪开发人员更有可能维护编码基数的关键部分。

sentences.english: As a conclusion, this paper shows that a party who calls for tenders will be better off under the lump—sum figure contract.
sentences.chinese: 文章最后证明了承包基数法对发包方更为有利。

sentences.english: The base value of the expression.
sentences.chinese: 返回基数表达式的指定次幂的值。

sentences.english: Cardinality affects join orders and join methods to a large extent.
sentences.chinese: 这个基数会大大影响连接顺序和连接方法。

sentences.english: The radix complement in the pure binary numeration system.
sentences.chinese: 纯二进制记数系统中的基数补码。

sentences.english: This thesis discusses word order concerning cardinals and ordinals and its relevant problems.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在讨论基数词和序数词的语序及其相关问题。

sentences.english: They havea lot of money nationally, because of their huge population.
sentences.chinese: 他们有很多钱，是因为人口基数摆在那里。
